title: BitcoinPenny
author: BitcoinPenny
created_time: September 01, 2022, 07:12:54 PMLast edit: November 07, 2022, 03:48:59 PM by BitcoinPenny
content: The 2022 Bitcoin Penny® MINI Manhole Cover: Copper Edition shown here with both gold (left) and orange (right) iridescent backgrounds.THE BITCOIN PENNY COMPANY is thrilled to announce the official release of the THIRD installment in our now infamous “Manhole Cover” Art Series — the NEW 2022 Bitcoin Penny® MINI Manhole Cover, COPPER EDITION!THE 2022 BITCOIN PENNY® MINI MANHOLE COVER, COPPER EDITIONOur ducks are all in a row, and production has officially started on this amazing .999 SOLID COPPER (Cu) version of our 2020 Bitcoin Penny® MINI Manhole Cover! However, due to the current bear market climate, these special art pieces will be created upon request in small batches only. (Please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery.) This limited manufacturing process is much more expensive, but it protects against over-production in the current market. Regardless, the total production is still limited to only 21 pieces. And as a courtesy to our customers who wish to own and display the TWIN SET of Aluminum and Copper Editions with MATCHING SERIAL NUMBERS, we have automatically reserved the matching serial numbers below for all customers who ordered the original Aluminum MMC. (For example, if forum member BOBtheHODLer ordered the Aluminum Editions #3 and #8, then the Copper Editions #3 and #8 were automatically reserved below for BOBtheHODLer.)All serial numbers listed below as AVAILABLE may be purchased separately and without obligation to purchase the matching Aluminum Edition. However, if you'd like to purchase the matching Aluminum Edition along with your new Copper Edition, then please feel free to make the request.DETAILS Project Name: Bitcoin Penny® MINI Manhole Cover, COPPER EDITIONManufactured By: The Bitcoin Penny Foundry (Cryptoville, USA)Manufactured For: Satoshi Water Company (Nakamoto, Japan)Year: 2022Material: Solid .999 Fine CopperFinish: Iridescent Rainbow*Base: Solid Walnut Base w/ 360° Swivel DisplayDimensions: 8” Round x .45” ThickWeight: 7.0 Lb (without 14oz Walnut Base)Quantity: 21 + PrototypeSerial Numbers: #00/21 (Prototype), #01/21, #02/21, #03/21, and so on. Fundable: Yes (Private key is sealed under copper tag on reverse side.)List of Public Addresses by MMC Serial Numbers: Coming SoonPrice: 0.125 BTCSpecial Bear Market Sale Price: 0.1 BTC*The incredible iridescent rainbow color background effect was created (accidentally) through an experimental proprietary production method which includes, among other manufacturing steps and techniques, a special low temperature baking process and a transparent Teflon® / PTFE finish. The result is truly amazing and must be seen in person to fully appreciate! The final iridescent rainbow color background varies with each individual piece, and all prototypes have resulted in absolutely stunning backgrounds of swirling Golds, Oranges, Greens, Blues, and Purples! This makes every single one of these special art pieces uniquely colorful! Serial #00 / 21 (Prototype) — NOT FOR SALESerial #01 / 21 — ReservedSerial #02 / 21 — AvailableSerial #03 / 21 — ReservedSerial #04 / 21 — ReservedSerial #05 / 21 — AvailableSerial #06 / 21 — AvailableSerial #07 / 21 — SOLDSerial #08 / 21 — SOLDSerial #09 / 21 — Special ReservationSerial #10 / 21 — AvailableSerial #11 / 21 — AvailableSerial #12 / 21 — AvailableSerial #13 / 21 — AvailableSerial #14 / 21 — AvailableSerial #15 / 21 — AvailableSerial #16 / 21 — AvailableSerial #17 / 21 — AvailableSerial #18 / 21 — AvailableSerial #19 / 21 — AvailableSerial #20 / 21 — SOLDSerial #21 / 21 — SOLDPURCHASING & PAYMENTSPlease make all BTC payments to the following addresses only: 1TBPCoEc2MYiQtjT4xduZjAqCBjPhTNDh or 3MJZ18DfLWBMF5hFjFLQS6DCLgyeLPg3Tx.PayPal and/or other cryptocurrencies such as Litecoin (LTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Roocoin (ROO) may be accepted upon request. PM to inquire.SHIPPINGFREE worldwide shipping. DOODLESYou'll receive a special Bitcoin Penny® MANHOLE COVER Edition Doodle Card with your purchase!For more information, simply PM.Regards,Chris @ The Bitcoin Penny Co.In Code We Trust® / E-Currency Unum®DISCLAIMER: Bitcoin Penny® Commemorative Coins are for entertainment purposes only. No cash value.
